SPECIAL.subTitle: We have 950 Loopheads up for grabs in this third Loophead dynamic NFT drop.
rules: 950 Loopheads - 700 by way of Lucky Draw and 50 for Top LPs.

SWAP_VOLUME_RANKING.subTitle: 950 Wearables up for grabs in the Wearable NFT drop.!
rules: 950 Wearables - 700 by way of Lucky Draw and 50 for Top Traders.
Lucky Draw - 700 Wearables,To be eligible, users must trade in one of the relevant 5 pairs from April 15 0:00(UTC) to May 15 0:00(UTC).
We will distribute a Wearable to the top 50 Traders in each pair.
Highest trading volumes per pair are calculated by the sum of $ amount of value (both orderbook and swap).

Each winner address can only receive one Wearable. If one address ranks top 50 in several pairs, it will only receive one Wearable. We count top 50 traders in LRC/ETH first, and then LRC/USDC, ETH/USDC, MANA/USDC and SAND/USDC sequentially.
We will need a leaderboard for top 100 traders.
